eventInfoList.dialogueText: It is freezing. The rocky ground beneath you drains what little heat there is from your body.
You look up at someone, standing over you.
In the darkness, you can make out a pair of eyes. Kind eyes. You feel safe, despite the numbing cold.
You keep eye contact for a moment before they break the silence.
"Close your eyes, @," a low voice says. "Rest."
You obey. The world around you closes into blackness, and an icy chill brushes against your cheek.
You feel nothing. You try to adjust your arms and legs, but you can't tell if they actually moved.
You hear the voice say something else, but now it sounds distant. A world away from you and your thoughts.
